# planetscale_backup (Data Source)

Backup DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "planetscale_backup" "my_backup" {
  branch       = "...my_branch..."
  database     = "...my_database..."
  id           = "...my_id..."
  organization = "...my_organization..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `branch` (String) The name of the branch
- `database` (String) The name of the database the branch belongs to
- `id` (String) The ID for the backup
- `organization` (String) The name of the organization the branch belongs to

### Read-Only

- `actor` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--actor))
- `backup_policy` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--backup_policy))
- `completed_at` (String) When the backup completed
- `created_at` (String) When the backup was created
- `database_branch` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--database_branch))
- `deleted_at` (String) When the backup was deleted
- `estimated_storage_cost` (Number) The estimated storage cost of the backup
- `expires_at` (String) When the backup expires
- `name` (String) The name of the backup
- `protected` (Boolean) Whether or not the backup is protected from deletion
- `pvc_size` (Number) Size of the PVC used for the backup
- `required` (Boolean) Whether or not the backup policy is required
- `restored_branches` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--restored_branches))
- `schema_snapshot` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--schema_snapshot))
- `size` (Number) The size of the backup in bytes
- `started_at` (String) When the backup started
- `state` (String) The current state of the backup
- `updated_at` (String) When the backup was last updated

<a id="nestedatt--actor"></a>
### Nested Schema for `actor`

Read-Only:

- `avatar_url` (String) The URL of the actor's avatar
- `display_name` (String) The name of the actor
- `id` (String) The ID of the actor


<a id="nestedatt--backup_policy"></a>
### Nested Schema for `backup_policy`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) When the backup policy was created
- `frequency_unit` (String) The unit for the frequency of the backup policy
- `frequency_value` (Number) A number value for the frequency of the backup policy
- `id` (String) The ID of the backup policy
- `last_ran_at` (String) When the backup was last run
- `name` (String) The name of the backup policy
- `next_run_at` (String) When the backup will next run
- `required` (Boolean) Whether the policy is a required system backup
- `retention_unit` (String) The unit for the retention period of the backup policy
- `retention_value` (Number) A number value for the retention period of the backup policy
- `schedule_day` (String) Day of the week that the backup is scheduled
- `schedule_time` (String) The time of day that the backup is scheduled, in HH:MM format
- `schedule_week` (String) Week of the month that the backup is scheduled
- `target` (String) Whether the policy is for production or development branches
- `updated_at` (String) When the backup policy was last updated


<a id="nestedatt--database_branch"></a>
### Nested Schema for `database_branch`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) When the resource was created
- `deleted_at` (String) When the resource was deleted, if deleted
- `id` (String) The ID for the resource
- `name` (String) The name for the resource
- `updated_at` (String) When the resource was last updated


<a id="nestedatt--restored_branches"></a>
### Nested Schema for `restored_branches`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) When the resource was created
- `deleted_at` (String) When the resource was deleted, if deleted
- `id` (String) The ID for the resource
- `name` (String) The name for the resource
- `updated_at` (String) When the resource was last updated


<a id="nestedatt--schema_snapshot"></a>
### Nested Schema for `schema_snapshot`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) When the schema snapshot was created
- `id` (String) The ID of the schema snapshot
- `linted_at` (String) When the schema snapshot was last linted
- `name` (String) The name of the schema snapshot
- `updated_at` (String) When the schema snapshot was last updated
- `url` (String) The URL to the schema snapshot in the PlanetScale app
